channel.title: AMC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AMC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Talamasca: The Secret Order’ Trailer Teases New Spy-Inspired Entry in Anne Rice’s Immortal Universe
item.description: The third series in AMC’s franchise, premiering Oct. 26, will feature Jason Schwartzman alongside Anne Rice’s ‘Interview with the Vampire’ stars Eric Bogosian and Justin Kirk.

item.title: ‘Talamasca: The Secret Order’ Trailer Teases New Spy-Inspired Entry in Anne Rice’s Immortal Universe
item.description: The third series in AMC’s franchise, premiering Oct. 26, will feature Jason Schwartzman alongside Anne Rice’s ‘Interview with the Vampire’ stars Eric Bogosian and Justin Kirk.

item.title: ‘Interview With the Vampire’ Takes on New Title for Season 3: ‘The Vampire Lestat’
item.description: The change reflects the AMC show’s move to focus on the second book in Anne Rice’s Vampire Chronicles series.

item.title: ‘Interview With the Vampire’ Takes on New Title for Season 3: ‘The Vampire Lestat’

item.title: ‘The Walking Dead: Dead City’ Renewed for Season 3 With New Showrunner
item.description: Franchise veteran Seth Hoffman will take the reins of the AMC series from Eli Jorné.

item.title: ‘Walking Dead: Dead City’ Renewed for Season 3, Seth Hoffman Takes Over as Showrunner
item.description: “The Walking Dead: Dead City” has been renewed for Season 3 at AMC, Variety has learned. The news comes a little less than a month after the Season 2 finale, which premiered on June 22. In
